events.message: I received my order yesterday but the smartphone screen is cracked and shows multiple scratches.
The reported issue has been categorized as a Product Defect based on the description of damage and scratches.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the defect report for the damaged smartphone screen.
Hello! I am sorry to hear about the cracked screen. I will assist you in resolving this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and confirm if the packaging was intact on delivery?
I attached pictures showing the cracks and scratches. The package looked fine but the damage must have occurred before shipping.
We can send a replacement smartphone immediately or issue a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like.
Thank you for the quick response. I would like to receive a replacement phone as soon as possible, please.
Your replacement order has been processed and shipped. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Checking in to ensure your replacement smartphone arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
